glsa.title: DjVu: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in DjVu could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: DjVu is a web-centric format and software platform for distributing documents and images.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in DjVu. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted DjVu file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All DjVu users should upgrade to the latest version:
